author: Fiona Denton
description:
I don’t think I’ve seen a prettier book than Sarah Mughal Rana’s Dawn of the Firebird for a while. But fear not, betwixt the gorgeous artwork (from artist Yohey Horishita) lies a deceptively dark tale of magic, battles, and a quest for vengeance. Also, and I fear I have to say this a lot, there […]

title: REVIEW: Dawn of the Firebird by Sarah Mughal Rana
